layout.singingstanza: What -- ev -- er Je -- ho -- vah pleas -- es He does in heaven and on earth. What -- ev -- er Je -- ho -- vah pleas -- es He does in heaven and on earth. What -- ev -- er Je -- ho -- vah pleas -- es He does in heav -- en and on earth. Psalm one hun -- dred thir -- ty five, verse six.

lyrics.stanza: Whatever Jehovah pleases He does in heaven and on earth. Whatever Jehovah pleases He does in heaven and on earth. Whatever Jehovah pleases He does in heaven and on earth. Whatever Jehovah pleases He does in heaven and on earth. Psalm one hundred thirty five, verse six.
